  • Constructor Details

    • Comment

      public Comment​(Account author, java.lang.String contents, Post parent, Post originalParent) throws InvalidPostException, HandleNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      Parameters:
      author - The account that created the post.
      contents - The contents of the comment message.
      parent - The post that the comment refers too.
      originalParent - The post's original parent (eg. if a comment, not the comment parent but the original post being commented on)
      Throws:
      InvalidPostException - if the message is empty or has more than 100 characters.
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.
      NotActionablePostException - if the ID refers to a endorsement post. Endorsement posts are not endorsable. Endorsements are not transitive. For instance, if post A is endorsed by post B, and an account wants to endorse B, in fact, the endorsement must refers to A.

    • Comment

      public Comment​(int id)
      Constructor for a deleted comment taking the ID as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the post.

  • Method Details

    • addComment

      public void addComment​(Comment comment)
      Adds a comment to the current post's comment ArrayList.
      Overrides:
      addComment in class Post
      Parameters:
      comment - the contents of the comment.

    • isContentsValid

      public static void isContentsValid​(java.lang.String contents) throws InvalidPostException
      Validation method checks if the contents of the message is valid.
      Parameters:
      contents - What the author has said.
      Throws:
      InvalidPostException - if the message is empty or has more than 100 characters.

    • getOriginalParent

      public Post getOriginalParent()
      Getter method for the Parent of the Parent of the post after the immediate post has been deleted.
      Returns:
      the Original Grand-Parent of the post.

    • makeOrphan

      public void makeOrphan()
      Makes a comment an orphan when the post it refers to is deleted.

    • addEndorsementArrayList

      public void addEndorsementArrayList​(Endorsement endorsement)
      Adds an endorsement to the current post's comment ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      endorsement - the endorsement object to be added to the comment.

    • removeComment

      public void removeComment​(Comment comment)
      Removes comment from an arraylist when a comment is deleted.
      Overrides:
      removeComment in class Post
      Parameters:
      comment - Comment to be removed.

    • getEndorsements

      public java.util.ArrayList<Endorsement> getEndorsements()
      Returns the ArrayList of Endorsement objects corresponding to the post.
      Returns:
      all endorsements for the current post

    • getComments

      public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> getComments()
      Getter method for Comments.
      Returns:
      an array list of comments.

    • getParent

      public Post getParent()
      Getter method for the parent of the post.
      Returns:
      The parent of the comment.

    • setParent

      public void setParent​(Post parent)
      Setter method for Parent post so it can be changed if the parent post is deleted.
      Parameters:
      parent - Post the comment refers to.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      The method generates a formatted string containing the details of a single post. The format is as follows: ID: [post ID] Account: [account handle] No. endorsements: [number of endorsements received by the post] | No. comments: [number of comments received by the post] [post message]
      Overrides:
      toString in class Post
      Returns:
      Blank string

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(int indentationLevel)
      toString which takes into account indentation The method generates a formatted string containing the details of a single post. The format is as follows: ID: [post ID] Account: [account handle] No. endorsements: [number of endorsements received by the post] | No. comments: [number of comments received by the post] [post message]
      Overrides:
      toString in class Post
      Parameters:
      indentationLevel - the indentation required for the showPostChildrenDetails method.
      Returns:
      Blank string
